tool_description: Identifies and resolves scheduling conflicts between multiple prayer schedules or external calendar events.

conflicting_schedules.description: Array of schedule IDs that may have conflicts

external_events.description: External calendar events in HH:MM-HH:MM format

resolution_strategy.description: Conflict resolution approach: reschedule_secondary, merge_compatible, prioritize_primary, suggest_alternatives

max_adjustment_minutes.description: Maximum minutes to adjust prayer times (5-120)

error_messages: Invalid schedule ID: One or more schedule IDs do not exist
Invalid resolution strategy: Use one of [reschedule_secondary, merge_compatible, prioritize_primary, suggest_alternatives]
Invalid external event format: Use HH:MM-HH:MM format for events
Invalid adjustment limit: max_adjustment_minutes must be between 5 and 120
No conflicts detected: All schedules are already compatible
usage: Provide primary schedule ID, conflicting schedules, and resolution strategy. Optionally include external events and adjustment limits. Returns resolved schedule with conflict resolutions.
